00001 <h2>Instructions</h2>
00002 <p>
00003         When you launch Singular, it will show an empty window saying "Drag files here".
00004         The window is ready to accept files &amp; folders to search for duplicates.
00005 </p>
00006 <p class="centered">
00007 <a href="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/drag-files-realsize.png"><img src="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/drag-files.png" alt="Drag files on Singular window" /></a>
00008 </p>
00009 <p>
00010         Once dropped files onto it, the app will start comparing the files (using file properties or by applying a hashing algorithm &mdash;
00011         by default, the MD5 digest),
00012         then it will report a list of duplicates, if any, that have been found.
00013 </p>
00014 <p class="centered">
00015         <a href="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/prefilter-complete-realsize.png"><img
00016                 src="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/prefilter-complete.png" alt="Files can optionally be prefiltered by size before hashing" /></a>
00017 </p>
00018 <p>
00019         You are now free to choose which files you'd like to delete and which you'd like to
00020         keep for every group. You won't be able to remove ALL the files &mdash; that is, almost
00021         one of the duplicates will remain on your disk. Isn't this security?!
00022 </p>
00023 <p class="centered">
00024 <a href="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/scan-complete-realsize.png"><img
00025         src="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/scan-complete.png" alt="List of duplicates found" /></a>
00026 </p>
00027 <p>
00028         After choosing which files to delete, click the button <strong>Remove</strong>
00029         and the files will be moved to the Trash. If you change your mind, files can
00030         be easily recovered.
00031 </p>
00032 <p class="centered">
00033 <a href="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/remove-files-realsize.png"><img src="/assets/images/software/macosx/singular/remove-files.png" alt="Choose which files to delete, then press the Remove button" /></a>
00034 </p>
00035 <p>
00036         A log of deletions will be kept until you want to, thus allowing you to replace
00037         the files just where they were &mdash; <strong>currently not implemented yet</strong>.
00038 </p>
00039 
00040 <h3>Screencast</h3>
00041 <p class="centered">
00042         <object width="425" height="355">
00043                 <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/JQOEflIp3kw&amp;rel=1"></param>
00044                 <param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param>
00045                 <embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/JQOEflIp3kw&amp;rel=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="355"></embed>
00046         </object>
00047 </p>
00048 <p>
00049         This video demonstrates how to scan a folder for duplicate files.
00050 </p>
